General.Name: Shanghai Putailai New Energy Technology Co.Ltd.
General.Description: Shanghai Putailai New Energy Technology Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the development and sale of materials of lithium-ion batteries and automation equipment in China. It offers lithium-ion battery anode materials, coating separators, automated coating equipment, aluminum laminated films, and nano powders. The company was founded in 2012 and is based in Shanghai, China.
General.Address: No. 116, Area G, Lane 456, Shanghai, China, 201315

1.Name: Dr. Zhong Wei  Han
1.Title: CFO, VP, Sec. of the Board & Director
